entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
